\/magazine\/poker-terms\/hole-cards: The term hole cards refers to any cards that players must keep secret from the rest of the table. Almost all poker variants make use of hole cards. The most common example is in the game of Hold’em. Players are each dealt 2 hole cards on the first betting round which they used in conjunction with ‘community cards’ to make a hand.
\/magazine\/poker-world\/how-to-deal-pok: With this guide, youll get the best tips to help you learn how to deal poker as a poker dealer in Texas Holdem games. Lets get started!
\/magazine\/poker-world\/how-become-poke: If you’ve ever wanted to be a poker dealer, 888poker shows you the ins and outs of making money by dealing cards.
\/magazine\/poker-terms\/no-limit: No Limit is a term used to describe the betting structure of a poker game. No limit means there is not restriction on how large a player can bet or raise at any given moment (although they can’t ever bet more than what is in their stack). The other types of betting structure are pot-limit (maximum bet or raise is the size of the pot) and fixed-limit (bets and raises occur in fixed increments). The most popular poker game currently is no limit Hold’em.
\/magazine\/strategy\/poker-betting-your: Betting in poker is one of the first fundamental play all newbies should learn. Find out all you need to know in this complete poker betting guide.
\/magazine\/strategy\/poker-etiquette-30: Poker etiquette involves an unwritten set of guidelines to follow that helps promote sportsmanship, speed of play, and a healthy atmosphere for the game.

\/magazine\/poker-terms\/heads-up: The term heads up refers to two handed poker. This would occur either because there are only two players dealt into a hand or because all other players at the table folded, leaving just two remaining. In a tournament the action becomes heads up when all other players have been knocked out of the tournament. The winner of the heads up match will win first prize in the tournament.
\/magazine\/poker-terms\/wrap-around-str: A wrap around straight is a straight that has an Ace somewhere in the middle of its structure, for example; QKA23. Wrap around straights are not legal hands according to the classic hand rankings system. However, they may sometimes be allowed in home games and some of the more exotic variants of poker.

\/magazine\/poker-terms\/flop\/: Flop is the second betting round in community card games such as Hold’em and Omaha. Three cards are dealt face up in the centre of the table which all players may use when building their 5-card hand. The three cards themselves are also generally referred to as the flop.
\/magazine\/poker-terms\/river\/: The river is the name given to the final betting round in a number of poker formats. We may most commonly associate theriver with the final betting round in Hold’em and Omaha, but the term is also used to describe the final betting round in variants such as Stud and Razz. After the river betting round is complete, players reveal the strength of their cards at showdown.

\/888live-events\/battle-of-malta-2022\/: The Battle of Malta is back! 888poker LIVE invites you to join poker players from around the world to this incredible island for a first class poker experience in a magical Mediterranean setting! Play in the Main Event for your share of the €1,000,000 GTD prize pool!
\/888live-events\/road-to-las-vegas-2022: Head to the biggest poker event in the world!
\/888live-events\/bucharest-2022\/: Join us as we kick off the return of live poker in one of Europe’s most magnificent cities – Bucharest.
\/888live-events\/barcelona-festival-202: 888poker LIVE Barcelona is BACK! Win a seat entry and join top poker players at this amazing event!
\/888live-events\/london-festival-2023-u: 888poker LIVE London Festival is back at the VIC Casino in London! Win a $2,200 package to the Main Event and join top players at this awesome live poker event!
\/888live-events\/bucharest-aug-2023\/: 2023 comes with another poker experience. Participate in the 888poker Bucharest Live Event between 8– 14 August and enjoy non-stop live poker, cash tables and many other surprises.
\/888live-events\/london-festival-2022\/: 888poker LIVE London is back at the Vic Casino in London! Win a seat entry and join top players at this awesome live poker event and play for a share of a whopping ₤50,000 GTD in the Main Event!
\/the-team\/jack-maate\/: Famous for his wicked sense of wit, get to know British YouTuber, podcaster & now 888poker ambassador Jack Dean, aka “JaackMaate”.
\/the-team\/caue-moura\/: 888poker cultural ambassador Cauê Moura is a Content Creator, Public figure & successful YouTuber with over 5M subscribers.
\/the-team\/kara-scott\/: 888poker ambassador Kara Scott has certainly made her mark in the poker world. Get to know one of the most well-known personalities in the industry only on 888poker.
\/the-team\/vivian-saliba\/: 888poker ambassador Vivan Saliba is a poker pro with an impressive track record. Watch this space for exciting collaborations with this true master of the game!
\/the-team\/cavalito\/: Brazilian poker pro Alexandre “Cavalito” Mantovani represents 888poker at online and live events as a member of the star-studded ambassador team. Stay tuned for updates!
\/the-team\/ian-simpson\/: Ian Simpson is an accomplished poker player and Twitch streamer. Join us as Ian explores the world of poker as a member of 888poker's team of ambassadors.
\/the-team\/lucia-navarro\/: 888poker ambassador Lucia Navarro is a poker pro with an impressive track record as the only woman on the Spanish national poker circuit to hold two prominent titles!
\/the-team\/stream-team\/: Meet the 888poker Stream Team featuring the best poker streamers in the biz bringing top-quality, live commentary right to your living room.
